pr_title: fixes for Async Models lifecycle hooks failing

timeline.message: elide standalone fixes for lifecycle hooks failing
Manual binding of lifecycle in elide spring

timeline.bodyText: Might as well make this consistent - let's remove all life cycle hook annotations from this class.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I thought we were going to do all of this logic in the AsyncExecutorService bean?
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Why not leave this in the ElideAsyncConfiguration file?
timeline.author: aklish
